H0.text: More bacteria will be destroyed is the main advantage of having the experiment repeated by three scientists who conducted the same experiment to analyze the effectiveness of a cleaning agent on household bacteria.

H1.text: The results will be more reliable when the experiment is repeated by three scientists to analyze the effectiveness of a cleaning agent on household bacteria.

H2.text: A scientific journal will publish their work is the main advantage of having the experiment repeated by three scientists conducting the same experiment to analyze the effectiveness of a cleaning agent on household bacteria.

H3.text: The conclusion will lead to new discoveries, which is the main advantage of having the experiment repeated by three scientists who conducted the same experiment to analyze the effectiveness of a cleaning agent on household bacteria.

A4.text: Replication is the process of repeating a study or experiment under the same or similar conditions. It is a crucial step to test the original claim and confirm or reject the accuracy of results as well as for identifying and correcting the flaws in the original experiment.

A5.text: Direct replications help confirm the accuracy of the findings within the conditions that were initially tested.
